name: R4B-DetectedIssue-R5-DetectedIssue
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B DetectedIssue into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue`

element.display: The provider or device that identified the issue

target.display: The provider or device that identified the issue
target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue.author` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `DetectedIssue.author` - author has change due to type change: R4B `author` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `author`

element.display: Issue Category, e.g. drug-drug, duplicate therapy, etc.

target.display: Specific type of detected issue, e.g. drug-drug, duplicate therapy, etc
target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.code`
R4B `DetectedIssue.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.contained`
R4B `DetectedIssue.detail` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `DetectedIssue.detail` - detail has change due to type change: R4B detail string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 detail
R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence`
R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.code`
R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.detail` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.detail`

R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue.evidence.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DetectedIssue.evidence.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `DetectedIssue.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DetectedIssue.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DetectedIssue.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.id`
R4B `DetectedIssue.identified[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.identified[x]`

element.display: Unique id for the detected issue

target.display: Unique id for the detected issue
target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.identifier`
R4B `DetectedIssue.implicated` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.implicated`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.implicitRules`
R4B `DetectedIssue.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DetectedIssue.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `DetectedIssue.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.meta`
R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation`
R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.action` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.action`
R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.author` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.author`
R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.date` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.date`

R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue.mitigation.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DetectedIssue.mitigation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `DetectedIssue.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DetectedIssue.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `DetectedIssue.reference` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.reference`

R4B `DetectedIssue.severity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.severity` - severity has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/detectedissue-severity|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/detectedissue-severity|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

R4B `DetectedIssue.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/detectedissue-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `DetectedIssue.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DetectedIssue.text`
